message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find valuable. I think a fair price would be $11,000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm happy to pay $10,000 for the product.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $11,000 is my ideal price, I could meet you halfway at $10,500. This offer reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
